Data: Chahal to Warner, 1 run Warner takes on Kohli again. This time he swoops down on the ball at short midwicket and throws the stumps down at the keeper's end. But Finch is in. Pushed through on middle, the ball slides on straight, bunted in front of short midwicket for a hasty single
Chahal to Finch, no run darted in on middle, Finch blocks back off the back foot
Chahal to Finch, no run tossed up on off, Finch is early into a drive and ends up skewing an inside edge onto the pad
Chahal to Finch, 1 leg bye skidding outside leg, full but Finch prefers to play back. Grazes the pad and trickles away square on the leg side
Chahal to Warner, no run pushed through on off, Warner covers the line and defends
Chahal to Warner, 1 run turn for Chahal with the new-ish ball. Quicker legbreak, spins back in and cramps Warner for room. Jabbed towards short midwicket
Hardik to Warner, no run short on middle, 128ks, Warner rises with the ball and fends it out to point
Hardik to Warner, no run back of a length on middle, Warner backs away outside leg, looks to manufacture swinging room, and punches to backward point
Hardik to Warner, 1 run back-of-a-length slower ball outside off, Warner waits for the ball to arrive, then stabs this offcutter to the off-side sweeper
Hardik to Finch, 1 run 137ks short ball on middle, Finch drops it in front of midwicket and hustles for a single. No discomfort
Hardik to Warner, 1 run wide of the crease, short, angled in on off, sits up, Warner checks his punch and secures a single to mid-off
Hardik to Finch, no run another slower offcutter outside off, Finch reads the change-up, opens the face and deflects the ball to backward point
Chahal to Warner, no run Chahal tosses it up just outside off, Warner shapes for a reverse-sweep but does not make contact
Chahal to Warner, 2 runs really full and outside off, Warner drives through the gap at cover for two
Chahal to Warner, SIX runs Slammed flat and hard straight of long-on for a six! Tossed outside off, Warner presses forward and lifts it, just clearing the boundary
Chahal to Warner, 1 run faster and flatter on the leg stump, clipped past midwicket
Chahal to Finch, 1 run full and straight, Finch cracks it down to long-on
Chahal to Warner, 1 run flighted on a fourth-stump line, Warner presses forward and drives a single to long-off

Hardik to Warner, FOUR runs just short of a good length and outside off, Warner stands tall and punches it to the right of mid-off, where Jadhav dives over the ball. The ball skims away to the boundary
Hardik to Warner, no run back of a length and slanted in on middle, played back to the bowler

Hardik to Warner, OUT Pandya's quick offcutter provides India with the breakthrough! Back of a length, skids in, then swerves away. A crease-bound Warner aims to punch it away through the covers, playing for the angle. Pandya beats the outside edge and hits the top of middle
Hardik to Smith, no run wide of the crease, angling in on off, Smith shuffles across and works to midwicket
Hardik to Smith, no run on a length on middle, pushed back to the bowler

Hardik to Smith, FOUR runs pretty full on off - perfectly blameless delivery - but Smith shuffles across off, brings his wrists into play, and flicks it away. Deep midwicket dishes out a dive but can't stop the ball from rolling to the boundary
Chahal to Finch, no run skidding on outside off, too close to Finch for a cut. Beaten
Chahal to Finch, 1 run nudged to square leg
Chahal to Smith, no run tossed outside off, driven to cover
Chahal to Smith, no run slower through the air, starts on middle and breaks away, defended to cover
Chahal to Smith, no run straight ball on middle, played back to the bowler
Chahal to Smith, 1 run pushed through full and outside off, driven down to long-off
Hardik to Smith, no run wide of the crease, but holds its line outside off, opens the face and taps to backward point
Hardik to Smith, 1 run back of a length and straighter in line, tucked away to the right of midwicket
Hardik to Finch, no run Pandya shifts wide of the crease, 131ks offcutter finishes outside off, beats the outside edge
Hardik to Finch, 1 run slower offcutter wide outside off, Finch spots the change-up and drives it to the cover-point sweeper
Hardik to Smith, 1 run pitched up and outside off, Smith presses forward and delightfully drives through the line to mid-off
Hardik to Finch, no run good length and angling in at off stump, Finch covers up in defence, and that's drinks
Chahal to Smith, 1 run tossed up and drifts in on off, eased down to long-on
Chahal to Finch, no run looped up on middle, hit to short fine leg off an inside edge
Chahal to Finch, SIX runs liberally tossed up outside off, breaks in, Finch sizes up the flight of the googly and launches it straight of long-on for a six
Chahal to Finch, no run pushed through full and straight, defended back to the bowler
Chahal to Finch, no run quicker googly, skids back into leg stump, Finch plays back and defends it back
Chahal to Finch, 1 run really, really full on the leg stump, jabbed down to long-on
Hardik to Finch, no run wide of the crease, cutter, finishes on off, defended back to the bowler
Hardik to Finch, no run Pandya slings a wide full-toss outside off, Finch extends his hands as far as he could and ends up toe-ending it back to the bowler instead of whooping it out of the ground
Hardik to Finch, 1 run on a length and outside off, stabbed into the covers
Hardik to Smith, 1 run full and just a shade outside off, calmly pushed down to long-on
Hardik to Finch, 1 run Pandya ventures wide of the crease and angles it into the hips of Finch, clipped away to deep midwicket

Hardik to Smith, no run wide of the crease, slower cutter, starts outside off and swerves in. Smith is too early into a cover drive and ends up squirting it back to the bowler. Pandya doing an excellent job for India
Chahal to Finch, no run flatter and skids back in, Finch does not pick the googly. Plays back and ekes out an inside edge onto the pad
Chahal to Finch, no run drifting into the pads again, glanced to short fine leg
Chahal to Finch, 1 run short legbreak outside off, cut away to the cover-point sweeper
Chahal to Smith, FOUR runs tossed up on middle, Finch twinkles down the track and drives it past the right of short midwicket. Great timing and placement to boot
Chahal to Smith, no run Smith uses his feet again and hits it back to the bowler, who takes some pace off the ball
Chahal to Smith, no run loopier and slower on off, Smith inches forward in defence
Hardik to Finch, no run back of a length and on top of off, Finch stands tall and punches back to Pandya

Hardik to Finch, FOUR runs Pandya ventures wide of the crease again. Gets this back-of-a-length ball to hold its line outside off. Finch thrusts his hands at the ball and sends a thick edge through where slip may have been
Hardik to Finch, 1 run on a length and outside off, pushed to mid-off for a hasty single. Bumrah effects a direct hit at the bowler's end but Finch is safe
Hardik to Smith, no run looks like a fast offcutter outside off, Pandya has Smith reaching out for it and goes past the outside edge
Hardik to Smith, 1 run back of a length and outside off, opens the face and glides it down to third man

Hardik to Finch, 1 run on a length and outside off, Finch presses forward, gets on top of the ball, punches to short cover, and tests his calf again. Pandey tumbled to his right to stop the ball but could not throw the stumps down. A direct hit could have dismissed Finch
Chahal to Finch, FOUR runs sliding into the pads, glanced fine of short fine leg. Bumrah chases the ball but only comes second in the race
Chahal to Finch, no run slower legbreak, poked to the covers
Chahal to Finch, FOUR runs that's dismissive. Floated up on middle, Finch clears his front leg and tonks it down the ground for a one-bounce four. Finch celebrates his return with a 61-ball fifty
Chahal to Finch, no run length ball on middle, defended
Chahal to Finch, no run skidding into leg stump, blocked
Chahal to Finch, no run loopier on off and breaks away, played to cover
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run full and outside off, clipped away to deep midwicket
Kuldeep to Finch, FOUR runs floated up on middle and breaks down leg, Finch goes low and bottom-edges a sweep
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run pushed through on middle, deflected square on the leg side for one
Kuldeep to Smith, no run tossed up and spins in, inside edged to midwicket
Kuldeep to Smith, no run Smith shuffles across off and works this shorter, flatter ball to square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run dragged shorter and outside off, punched through the line to long-off
Hardik to Smith, no run on a length and skids on outside off, opens the face and dabs the ball to point
Hardik to Smith, no run nice and full outside off, driven back to the bowler
Hardik to Smith, FOUR runs full and straight, a whirl of the wrists sends the ball away to the square-leg boundary. Smith shuffled across and beat the man in the deep to his right
Hardik to Smith, 1 run slower offcutter outside off, stabbed to backward point
Hardik to Finch, no run wide of the crease, slammed in at the top of off, jabbed to point
Hardik to Finch, FOUR runs overpitched and outside off, Finch lays into it, drilling a drive through the covers. The man in the deep is too square to cut it off
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run worked with the break to long leg
Kuldeep to Finch, no run very full and outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Kuldeep to Finch, no run lobbed up on the leg stump, poked to the covers off a leading edge
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run sliding into the pads, glanced to short fine leg
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run full and on a fourth-stump line, Smith responds with a wristy drive to long-off
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run a flat dart on middle, which is driven down to long-on
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 2 runs just short of a good length and outside off, cut away to the left of sweeper cover
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run back of a length on off, opens the face and runs the ball to point
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run wide of the crease, slower ball, finishes on off. Possibly an offcutter. Finch plays early and skews it down the ground
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run really full and wide outside off, Smith reaches out for the ball drives it regally to the cover-point sweeper
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run good-length offcutter, driven to midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run just short of a good length and outside off, chopped down to third man
Bumrah to Finch, no run good length outside off, carved to backward point
Bumrah to Finch, no run on a length, seaming back in, honing in on off. The perfect length to Finch, pushed back to the bowler
Bumrah to Finch, 1 run that's a tad short, and straight. Helped along down to fine leg with the angle.
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run nice lengths from Bumrah, slightly back of a length outside off, a typical Smith jab into the cover point region
Bumrah to Finch, no run the first full delivery of the over, outside off, driven languidly to mid-off
Bumrah to Finch, no run 135 kph, full outside off, blocked to cover.
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run full outside off, Smith opens his bat face and guides it to the sweeper cover. Just looking for some control here are India
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run nicely bowled, a slower ball outside off, blocked to cover. The knuckle ball actually
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run goes wide of the crease, comes back in, Finch sees width but it isn't really wide enough to cut. Beaten on his cut

Bhuvneshwar to Finch, SIX runs the slower ball again and far too full, Finch picks the variation, gets underneath the length and extends his drive, that's all really. Fantastic timing, short boundaries, six anyday
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run punched this time to long-on
Bhuvneshwar to Smith, 1 run short and wide, slashed to the deep point fielder

Kuldeep to Smith, 3 runs fantastic placement. Great stop from Pandya too. Flat down leg, Smith paddles him hard down towards fine leg. Pandya runs around from wide fine leg, and pulls the ball back in to save a run
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run the googly, can pick it from the line, started that well down leg, off the outside edge to Jadeja at backward point
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run wristspin and bounce. Flat down leg, Finch looks for the sweep, but gets a thick leading edge which lobs over Chahal at short fine leg
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run on the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket
Kuldeep to Finch, no run and the googly again, can pick it from the line, starts it down leg. Finch watchfully defends. Seven riskless runs
Chahal to Smith, 1 run flat outside off, blocked towards point for one
Chahal to Finch, no run drifts on the pads, nudged to short fine leg
Chahal to Finch, no run short and wide, not bowling full intentionally. Slapped to Kohli at cover, who dives to his left, much to the crowd's delight
Chahal to Finch, no run quick and straight, skewed to midwicket. Still nothing full
Chahal to Finch, FOUR runs he probably anticipated that. Short outside off, Finch sat back and slapped a pull just wide of midwicket. Good batting
Chahal to Finch, 1 run stays back again, predictable. Straight and flat, punched to long-off
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run a full googly that is picked easily and driven to long-off for one
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run excellent single from Finch. Called Smith through right away. A googly outside off, carved towards backward point
Kuldeep to Finch, no run the googly on off and middle, defended
Kuldeep to Finch, no run the stock ball, flat around off, pushed away towards point

Kuldeep to Finch, SIX runs just clears long-off. Would have been gobbled up at the Gabba, but not here. The googly outside off, Finch picks the variation, tries to go over cover but gets it straighter. Bumrah at long-off just watches it go over him
Kuldeep to Finch, FOUR runs flat and wide outside off and boooom! Straight past Smith. Down the ground. Long-off has no chance. Sublime hitting. His muscle has got him 10 runs in two balls

Chahal to Smith, FOUR runs just beautiful batting. Negating wristspin with so much ease. Runs at the bowler, meets the ball as it pitches and flicks the ball - against the spin - over midwicket. How easy did he make a tough shot look?
Chahal to Smith, no run flat outside off, defended into the cover
Chahal to Smith, 1 run lots of loop around middle and leg, driven to long-on
Chahal to Finch, 1 run short and wide outside off, slapped to the sweeper cover
Chahal to Smith, 1 run shortish outside off, punched to the deep point fielder for a run
Chahal to Finch, 1 run overpitched and straight, driven to long-off. Milking these spinners, setting up a 90-run last 10?
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run too full from Kuldeep outside off, driven to long-on
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run excessively full on the pads, worked away to deep midwicket
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run the googly, again it's the line and Finch picks it, started that down leg. Finch gets low and paddles his hard sweep to deep backward square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, no run flat down leg, Smith looks for a hard sweep again but misses. Dhoni does well to stop byes
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run overpitched outside off, driven to long-off
Kuldeep to Finch, no run the googly down leg, kept out
Hardik to Smith, 1 run full around off, defended to cover, where Kohli picks up and throws at the bowler's end, the back-up can't get there in time and concedes the overthrow. Unnecessary
Hardik to Finch, no run a slower cutter outside off, the ball goes underneath Finch's lazy drive. Fatigue maybe?
Hardik to Finch, no run good length, around off, pushed back to the bowler. Using the variations nicely here is Pandya.
Hardik to Finch, no run good length around off, flicked to midwicket from the crease
Hardik to Finch, 2 runs good length outside off, sliced behind point for a couple. The backward point fielder should have done better, just escorted it to the deep fielder. No dive
Hardik to Finch, no run good stop from Pandya. A three-run over, India will take that. A slower ball outside off, driven back where Pandya dives to his right and saves a run
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run flat on the pads, flicked down to fine leg again for one
Kuldeep to Finch, FOUR runs a hundred for Finch in his first game back. Sensational batting. The googly down leg, sweeps this hard behind square, keeps it along the ground. A fistpump, not much more
Kuldeep to Finch, no run flat and straight, defended back
Kuldeep to Finch, SIX runs the topspinner, full and flighted outside off, Finch gets low and goes weeeeee, right in his wheelhouse and the sweep goes welll over long-on.
Kuldeep to Finch, no run flatter this time, Finch goes back and defends
Kuldeep to Finch, no run fuller and quicker outside off, driven back to the bowler. I'm definitely jumping the gun but a double-hundred is not out the question
Hardik to Smith, 1 run a full slow ball outside off, driven to long-on with ease
Hardik to Finch, 2 runs good length on middle and leg, nudged behind square for a couple. Sensational batting from Finch. India under pressure. 200 up
Hardik to Finch, no run good length around off, clipped to midwicket
Hardik to Finch, FOUR runs smashed! Shortish on middle, sits up for Finch and he gives it a good thwack through midwicket. Disdain, out of my face Hardik.
Hardik to Finch, 1 wide drifts down leg, wide called
Hardik to Finch, no run good length outside off, sliced away to backward point
Hardik to Finch, 1 wide strays down leg again, does not want to offer width
Hardik to Finch, no run a good slower ball to finish, clipped to midwicket
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 wide flat down leg, another wide. Dhoni collects and whips the bails off in a flash
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run overpitched flight on off, flicked to long-on
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run quick on the pads, worked away to deep square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, no run runs down at the bowler and clips the stock ball to square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, no run ooh, short and straight, Smith goes back and punches to cover. Won't be happy with that result
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run drifting down leg, a tickle on that from Smith to fine leg

Kuldeep to Finch, SIX runs a mis-timed six. Wanted to go over long-on or midwicket but the ball turns, takes the outside half and travels straight over the bowler for six. Just clears the boundary too
Hardik to Smith, no run good length around off, Smith misses a run after failing to connect with a flick
Hardik to Smith, 1 run full outside off, 133 kph, driven to the sweeper cover
Hardik to Finch, 1 run good length, a slower delivery, 130 kph, off the body towards gully for a run. Hit the inside edge
Hardik to Smith, 1 run full delivery outside off, driven towards wide mid-off. Chahal cuts it off
Hardik to Finch, 1 run short and wide outside off, scythed through to deep point for another run
Hardik to Smith, 1 run 132 kph, inside edge onto the pad to square leg. Smith brings up his fifty too
Kuldeep to Smith, no run shimmies down and works the ball to midwicket
Kuldeep to Smith, no run flatter trajectory, straight and quick, pushed back to the bowler
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run shorter, straighter, nudged away to deep midwicket
Kuldeep to Finch, 2 runs short on off, Finch stays back and pummels a pull wide of long-on. Rahane gets across and stops the boundary

Kuldeep to Finch, OUT taken at deep midwicket. Finch's belligerence ends. It's full and Finch sees an opportunity to hit it over midwicket, but Finch can't get underneath the length, which means his heave goes straight and flat to Jadhav at deep midwicket, who takes it awkwardly. A white towel falls off, and Finch thinks it's the ball. But has to walk off. Fine innings from Finch, has put Australia in command
Kuldeep to Maxwell, no run the googly down leg, worked away to midwicket
Hardik to Smith, no run good length outside off, pushed to cover from the back foot
Hardik to Smith, 2 runs on the pads, flicked away to deep backward square leg for a comfortable brace
Hardik to Smith, 1 run fullish delivery outside off, driven to the sweeper cover
Hardik to Maxwell, no run 132 kph, short and straight, it's not short enough, doesn't get up much either. Maxwell wants to ramp it over third man, but is hit on the glove. Awkwardly played
Hardik to Maxwell, 1 run good length outside off, punched to the sweeper cover
Hardik to Smith, FOUR runs a thick outside edge for four. A slower ball outside off, Smith plays the line, but the ball takes the outside edge and races away past short third man
Bumrah to Maxwell, no run full and wide outside off to start from Bumrah, guided to backward point
Bumrah to Maxwell, 1 run good length outside off, carved down to third man
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run a slower ball outside off, worked to midwicket for a run, 114 kph
Bumrah to Maxwell, no run looking for the yorker, ends up as a low full toss, sliced to backward point
Bumrah to Maxwell, no run whipped away to mid-on, 135 kph
Bumrah to Maxwell, no run a low full toss on middle is worked away to midwicket. Good from Bumrah
Chahal to Smith, no run quick outside off, turning away, 87 kph, pushed back
Chahal to Smith, 1 run shortish outside off, spins away and Smith's intended pull to midwicket goes to square leg instead
Chahal to Maxwell, 1 run a slow delivery outside off, plenty of flight, slapped to long-off. Didn't make the mistake of trying to go over long-on like Chennai
Chahal to Smith, no run quick and flat, nudged to midwicket
Chahal to Smith, no run sees Smith coming and fires this wide outside off. Smith is good enough to defend
Chahal to Smith, no run terrific over, just two from it. Flight outside off, driven away to cover. Losing some momentum
Kuldeep to Maxwell, no run flat and wide outside off, that line is very intentional, slapped to cover
Kuldeep to Maxwell, 1 run the googly, bowled it wide outside off, powered to long-on. Don't think he read that
Kuldeep to Smith, 2 runs a googly outside off, sees Smith coming and bowls it wide. Smith can still cut through point for a couple. Excellent cricket
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run shortish and wide, hit to the sweeper cover from the back foot
Kuldeep to Maxwell, 1 wide the slow googly outside off is too wide and is called
Kuldeep to Maxwell, 1 wide the seam-up delivery, took everyone by surprise but it's down leg. 90 kmph.
Kuldeep to Maxwell, 1 run flat and short outside off, muscled to long-on. Not getting the elevation he wants

Kuldeep to Smith, OUT easily taken at long-off. It's the googly outside off, Smith wanted to get closer to the ball and hit it straighter but the ball skews off the outside half and lobs to Bumrah at long-off. Looking into the sun is Bumrah, but he has his sunglasses on. Kuldeep has been a touch expensive, but has got two big wickets when they're trying to go after him.

Chahal to Maxwell, OUT Maxwell gone now. Two in two for India. Australia losing their way. He shuffled right across, looking to go straight. He came running down but Chahal fires this wide outside off, so wide that Maxwell can't even get close to it. Misses it by a distance and Dhoni's hands are far too quick for Maxwell to consider going back. Chahal has him thrice in this series now, all while Maxwell has tried to take him down. Fantastic defensive bowling from India's spinners
Chahal to Stoinis, no run quick on the pads, nudged to midwicket. Vital dot balls at this time of the innings
Chahal to Stoinis, 1 run shortish outside off, turning away, cut to the deep point fielder
Chahal to Head, 1 run flat outside off, driven to mid-off for a run. The fielder hits the stumps at the bowler's end
Chahal to Stoinis, no run quick and straight, flat, pushed back
Chahal to Stoinis, no run short and wide outside off, left alone from Stoinis, wanted a wide. Umpire doesn't think so
Kuldeep to Head, 1 run lots of flight outside off, well outside his hitting arc, driven to long-off for one
Kuldeep to Stoinis, SIX runs enough muscle behind that to clear long-off. A googly outside off, Stoinis got underneath it and swung cleanly over long-off. He may have read that well
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run slow outside off, pushed in front of cover for a run.
Kuldeep to Head, no run the googly outside off, Head goes back and punches to point
Kuldeep to Head, 1 run 75 kph, lots of flight outside off, punched to long-off
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run the googly on off, worked to square leg for one
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 wide full and too wide outside off, called. A few too many extras here
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run full and wide, sliced to deep point. Keeping the ball out of the hitting arc

Bhuvneshwar to Handscomb, 1 run well out with a direct hit. A good length delivery is patted to Chahal at cover. Stoinis set off late, Handscomb called for one as soon as he hit it. Chahal misses at the batsman's end
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 wide another short wide delivery that is too wide for legality

Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, FOUR runs what power from Stoinis. Bhuvneshwar goes straight this time, full around off, drilled past Bhuvi's feet. Long-off didn't have a long way to go but did not have a chance
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run a low full toss outside off is smashed to the deep cover for one
Bhuvneshwar to Handscomb, no run a full slow delivery outside off, Handscomb stays in his crease, trying to go over long-on but no connection
Bhuvneshwar to Handscomb, no run another big hoick that Handscomb misses. Full outside off, no bat.
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run a slower ball outside off, Stoinis can't get bat on ball. It's another cutter. Stoinis' strike rate now dips below 100

Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 run good length outside off, pushed to the sweeper cover. Stoinis thinks of two, but Rahane is quick on it. Great bowling, the lengths are so intentionally all over the place that the batsmen can't line 'em up
Bumrah to Handscomb, 1 run a wide slower delivery outside off, worked away to deep square leg. Just one more
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 run fuller than good length around off, punched down to long-off. Another single more

Bumrah to Handscomb, OUT sensational catching from Pandey. A slower delivery outside off is hit nicely to long-off, it looks like six for the entirety of its trajectory until Pandey gets around to his right, takes a reverse-cupped catch, realises he was stepping over the boundary and threw it back up in the air. Then, he nonchalantly got back in and took the catch, no fuss, no trouble.
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 run on the pads, and off it for a run to fine leg. Just four off the over
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, no run a full drifty delivery outside off, may have been the knuckle ball, 124 kph, cut to point

Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run shuffled right across, full on off, hit away to midwicket via the pad. It's pad and then bat. Kohli wants to review, not a bad time to do so. Definitely pad first, but impact is just outside the line. So good call from the umpire Shamshuddin
Bhuvneshwar to Head, 1 run a slower wide delivery outside off, chopped to backward point
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, no run excellent yorker, bang on target. Outside off. Jammed out
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 wide a wide knuckle ball outside off, well outside the tramline too, wide called
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, no run another fine yorker outside off, jammed away to cover
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run a slow wide delivery outside off, driven to long-off for one. Just four off the over
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run good length on off, Stoinis can only keep it out. Fine bowling this
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 leg bye skiddy, 132 kph, full around leg, beats Stoinis' inside edge and hits him on the back leg

Bumrah to Head, OUT goes straight through , 119 kph, it's a slower ball on middle and leg, the offcutter. Head plays with an angled bat, trying to find midwicket, but that means the ball has enough room to go through his flick and hit the stumps. Middle stump is uprooted. Australia losing their way
Bumrah to Handscomb, 1 run shuffles right across and flicks down to fine leg for one
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 run on a length around off, inside-edged towards midwicket for one. A tight, but easy run
Bumrah to Handscomb, 1 wide strays down leg for a wide
Bumrah to Handscomb, no run 137 kph, full around off, driven to mid-off where Pandey is quick on the ball. Stoinis is sent back in time
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run full and wide outside off, sliced to deep point. Excellent defensive bowling
Bhuvneshwar to Agar, 1 run full and straight, that's Agar's job, bat on ball to long-on for one
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run extremely full outside off, Stoinis is sitting back in the crease but still can't get enough on his drive. To long-off for one
Bhuvneshwar to Agar, 1 run 120 kph, a wide slower ball outside off, Agar chips a drive to the sweeper cover. Falls well in front
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run smashed away, but the field is well set and Bhuvneshwar is bowling to his field. Full and wide, hammered to deep cover for one.
Bhuvneshwar to Agar, no run a good wide delivery outside off, inside the tramline.
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run Stoinis backs away and Bumrah follows him, good length on leg, defended back. Can't do much more. Sensational bowling
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 wide the wide slower delivery that is too wide. Called a wide
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 wide gets inside the line this time, trying to help it down to fine leg but it drifts down leg for a wide.
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 run good length outside off, carved away to the sweeper cover for one more. Superb stuff this
Bumrah to Agar, 2 runs a low full toss on middle and leg, whipped to wide long-on where Pandey cuts off the boundary. Two more
Bumrah to Agar, FOUR runs that's poor line. A slow delivery down leg, clipped away over short fine leg for four. Not the right line
Bumrah to Agar, 1 run full and wide outside off, drilled away to deep cover for a run. Executed well there
Bumrah to Stoinis, 2 runs good length around off, shovelled past square leg for a couple.

5.06pm What a finish from India. They have done superbly to restrict Australia under 300, they conceded just 59 runs off the last 10 overs after Aaron Finch's sensational hundred and another Steven Smith fifty put them in command of the game. All the bowlers contributed nicely, taking wickets and bowling good defensive lines. Australia's batting came to the fore in the first half of the innings, but then failed miserably in the second half. They have the runs on the board, but is it enough? This total is just 12

5.43pm Hello, again. Thanks, Nikhil. From 224 for 1, Australia had slumped to 275 for 6. The visitors managed only 38 in their last six overs to finish with a below-par 293 for 6. Will the pitch play better under lights as India's captain Virat Kohli suggested at the toss? India need 294 to wrap up the series. Rohit walks out to bat with Rahane. Cummins is armed with the new ball. He tears in from over the wicket with two slips to back him up
Cummins to Rahane, no run back of a length and swerves in on off, 144ks, Rahane blocks it beside his feet
Cummins to Rahane, 1 run on a length and swings away outside off, 142ks, Rahane uses the pace of Cummins to his advance
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run much fuller on a fifth-stump line, 142ks, Rohit is right forward to middle a forward defensive to cover
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run just short of a good length and angling in on middle, Rohit sits back and blocks to the leg side
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run good length and slanted in on off, 146s - pace like fire - Rohit presses forward and blocks it back to Cummins

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short and outside off, 143ks, beats Rohit for pace and does not bounce as much as the batsman expected it to. He stabs at the ball in the channel and nearly drags it back onto the stumps
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run nice and full on off, he finds movement off the surface, takes the outside edge and runs down to third man
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 run pitched up on off, Rahane nurdles it through the gap at midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run tight line on off, Rohit is tight in his defence as well
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run shorter and just a shade outside off, 141ks, punched on the up to short cover
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 2 wide very full and veering down leg, beats the glance, beats the keeper too
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 run wide of the crease, Coulter-Nile hammers one into the middle of the deck. Rahane swivels on the back foot and smartly pulls this chest-hunting ball to deep square leg
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run on a length on a fifth-sixth stump line outside off, no shot
Cummins to Rahane, no run back of a length and angled in on off, 144ks, blocked back down the pitch off the back foot

Cummins to Rahane, no run back of a length and outside off, Rahane punches sweetly but can't get the ball past cover-point. The throw is wild from Smith, to the right of Stonis at mid-off. Stoinis can't can't collect is on the half-volley. The umpires deem is a dead ball. Not sure why
Cummins to Rahane, no run stands tall and punches through the line to the covers
Cummins to Rahane, no run back of a length and angled in, squeezed off the inside half to the leg side
Cummins to Rahane, no run variable bounce! On a length and zipping through outside off, beats Rahane's cut, and skids under the bat to Handscomb
Cummins to Rahane, 1 run very full and angling into the pads, flicked away through square leg
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run back of a length and slanted in, tucks 'em up for room, worked away to short midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run wide of the crease but the quick gets it to hold its line just a shade outside off, Rahane simply taps the ball to cover
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, FOUR runs Rahane dashes down the track, manufactures a half-volley and drives it inside out over extra cover. The cross-seam delivery is dispatched to the boundary
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 run Rahane rides the bounce of this short delivery outside off and dabs it to third man
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short and just outside off, cramps Rohit for room. He chops it behind point and sets off for a single. Good response from Rahane
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 leg bye skidding into the thigh, 142ks, Rahane misses the flick, as the ball kisses the pad and rolls to leg
Cummins to Rahane, no run short on top of off, punchily defended to mid-on off the back foot
Cummins to Rahane, 1 run Rahane picks it from off stump and twirls it away through midwicket. Lovely wristwork

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs 145ks bouncer outside off, Rohit picks the length early. Rocks back and crunnnnnches a pull over long leg. Sends the ball to the second tier. Whoa, what a shot!. He had scooped a similar rapid ball from Chameera for a six in Sri Lanka
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on off, 146ks, quietly defended to point
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and angled in on middle, 144ks, pushed back to Cummins
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run picked off the pads to fine leg
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run full on middle, pushed down to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs a bit too full and straying into the pads, Rohit unfurls a vintage drive, sends it rolling through midwicket with a straight bat
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run on a length and outside off, jabbed to the covers
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run wide of the crease, short, angled in on middle, punched down to long-on
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs Rohit launches this over long-off for a six. Pitched up and outside off - right in his swinging arc - he nonchalantly lifts it over the boundary
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length and outside off, Rohit rides it down to third man
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and attached with plenty of width outside off, Rohit creams it straight to backward point

Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs Maxwell dives full-length to his left at backward point but can't cling onto this half-chance. 147ks, short and wide outside off, Rohit scythes it away in the air and gets away. Too harsh to term it a drop
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run pitched up and outside off, Rohit unfurls another drive from the top draw but can't get it past mid-off
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run just short of a good length and angled in, blocked to leg off the back foot
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run shortish and outside off, guided to backward point
Stoinis to Rahane, 1 run shovelled away wide of midwicket
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length-ball offcutter on off, Rohit sits back and works it square on the leg side
Stoinis to Rahane, no run back of a length on off, Rahane stands tall and punches it back down the pitch
Stoinis to Rahane, no run slower ball outside off, offcutter sticks in the surface and bounces, Rahane opens the face and quells it to point
Stoinis to Rahane, no run pitched up and outside off, Rahane leans into a drive, opens the face and strokes it to cover
Stoinis to Rahane, 2 runs just short of a good length and outside off, Rahane crashes a cut to the left of the cover-point sweeper. Agar makes a mess and fumbles, but the batsman is kept to two
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run good length on off, forward and played back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length just a shade outside off, punched to cover

Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs Rohit launches it outta the ground! Fetch that, Richardson. He races down the track, the bowler drags it short on the leg stump. Picks it off the hips and pulls it nonchalantly, sending the white ball flying out of the ground. Grand...
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slower full ball on middle, patted down to long-on
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run shorter on off, turns it to the right of midwicket and hands over the strike to Rohit
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run cross-seamer outside off, kicks up, Rohit rises with it and dabs to short third man
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length offcutter, guided to short fine leg off the hips
Stoinis to Rahane, FOUR runs Rahane forays down the track, manufactures his own length - half-volley - and hoicks it across the line to the right of a diving short midwicket. Not pretty but effective
Stoinis to Rahane, no run very full and scoots through outside off, more evidence of variable bounce as this offcutter grazes the edge but it falls well short of Handscomb
Stoinis to Rahane, FOUR runs hip-high short ball on the leg stump, tripe bowling, Rahane whips it square of short fine leg
Stoinis to Rahane, FOUR runs dug in short and wide outside off - third man is up - Rahane rides the bounce, rolls his wrists, and dabs it past the right of the man in the circle
Stoinis to Rahane, no run pitched up and just a shade outside off, driven crisply but straight to the bowler
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs slides on outside off, Rohit hits it through point, calls for two. Takes on Coulter-Nile's arm and gets it
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short and skidding in on off, 96ks, hangs back and punches a single down to long-on
Agar to Rahane, 1 run slides in at off stump again, Rahane brings his wrists into play, and works it through square leg
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run straight ball on off Rohit blocks it back to the bowler
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short dart outside off, Rohit punches through the line to long-off
Agar to Rahane, 1 run full and straight, milked square of short fine leg
Kane Richardson to Rahane, no run full and skids through under lights. Rahane reaches out for the ball in the channel and is beaten past the outside edge
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run back of a length on off, clipped away to long leg
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run pitched up and outside off, slices a drive to backward point
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run just short of a good length on middle, Rohit stands tall and punches the ball to mid-on
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pitched up and outside off, Rohit flows forward and middles a drive to sweeper
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run hip-high short ball outside off, Rahane swivels and pulls it along the ground to deep midwicket
Agar to Rahane, no run tossed on off, opens the face and taps it to cover
Agar to Rahane, no run skids on outside off, 96ks, presses forward and pushes the ball to the same fielder
Agar to Rahane, 1 run angling in on off, clipped with the angle through square leg
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run looped up on leg stump, Rohit stays leg-side of the ball and strokes it back to Agar
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run darted in on middle, punched off the back foot to the left of Agar

Agar to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs Rohit is making batting look ridiculously easy in Indore. He raises a fifty off 42 balls. Agar, for a change tosses it up on middle stump, Rohit hoists it straight down the ground for another six. Lovely flow of the arms
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 2 runs Rahane stands up tall to this shortish ball outside off and beautifully punches through the line to the right of sweeper
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run dragged short and wide - wider than a set of stumps outside off - Rahane reaches out for the ball and carves a cut to sweeper
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slower cutter outside off, Rohit plays early and swishes it to the cover-point sweeper
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run short and outside off, the ball is coming on nicely under lights, Rahane pulls it hard to deep midwicket
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and outside off, this ball stops on Rohit who checks his punch and strokes it to mid-off
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pitched up on middle, eased down the ground to long-on

Agar to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs skids on outside off, keeps low, Rohit chops it away square through the off side. Coulter-Nile runs across from sweeper cover, dives, and bangs his head against the turf. Ouch! He grimaces in pain
Agar to Rohit Sharma, no run pushed through on middle, bunted to midwicket off the back foot
Agar to Rohit Sharma, 1 run straight ball on middle, Rohit presses forward and secures a single down to long-off
Agar to Rahane, no run tossed on off, forward defensive
Agar to Rahane, FOUR runs thigh-high short ball on off stump, Rahane picks the length early and thrashes a pull to the right of a diving Glenn Maxwell at short midwicket
Agar to Rahane, 1 run Rahane brings up the century stand with a wristy whip to deep square leg off the back foot
Stoinis to Rahane, no run on a length and on middle, pushed down to mid-on
Stoinis to Rahane, 1 run Rahane walks out, meets a length ball on off and clips it away to deep square leg
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full and straight, Rohit plays with a straight bat and drives to deep midwicket
Stoinis to Rahane, no run offcutter, short and that's punches straight of mid-on
Stoinis to Rahane, FOUR runs thigh-high short ball outside off, it does not get up, Rahane adjusts to the bounce or the lack of it and flays a pull to the long leg boundary. India coasting along
Stoinis to Rahane, no run slower ball outside off, full, dinked to point off an open face
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball on off, nearly 148ks, played back to Cummins
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs whoa! Grand. Pitched up and outside off, Rohit plants his front foot and lofts it straight over the bowler's head

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs shorter and outside off, Rohit fetches a pull from there and expertly places it to the right of deep midwicket. Agar throws himself to his right at the edge of the boundary but the ball beats him. Agar is in discomfort and leaves the field
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run picked off the pads through midwicket
Cummins to Rahane, 1 run Rahane uses the pace of Cummins to his advantage and dabs this full one from outside off to third man

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run Handscomb, the part-time keeper, drops a low catch to his right. He reprieves Rohit on 67. Back of a length and outside off, Rohit aims to dab it down to third man. Instead, he nicks it fine enough. Handscomb dives to his right but can't cling onto the one-handed catch. Difficult chance as the ball was dying on him
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run pitched up on off, Rahane presses forward and smoothly drives the ball to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, FOUR runs leg-side ball, Rahane simply glances it fine, and brings up a run-a-ball fifty
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run length ball on off, Rahane dinks it to backward point
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 run full and outside off, Rahane eases a drive to sweeper on the off side
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run Rohit stands tall, punches a back-of-a-length ball from outside off to backward point
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run wide of the crease, slanted in on off, Rohit aims to run it down to third man. Instead, plays it squarer to backward point
Kane Richardson to Rahane, no run full and outside off, patted to point
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 2 runs just short of a good length and outside off, Rahane rolls his wrists and controls a pull to Finch at deep square leg
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run too straight in line, picked off to deep midwicket now

Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs Cummins runs to his left from deep midwicket and swats the ball back into the field of play. Excellent effort. Shortish and outside off, Rohit hammered a pull to cow corner
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and outside off, does not bounce at all, Rohit slashes, and skews it back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run on a length on off, forward defensive
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run on a length and outside off, Rahane drives it on the up to mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run Rahane walks at the bowler, this is dug in shorter and outside off, diffused to cover
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run wide of the crease, holds its line outside off, lashed away to backward point
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 leg bye leg-side ball, deflected down to long leg
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run shortish and outside off, Rohit gets on top of the bounce and caresses it to sweeper cover
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, FOUR runs hip-high short ball on off stump, Rahane sizes up the length and stylishly swats it away to the right of deep square leg
Kane Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short and skids on outside off, eased to sweeper cover off the back foot
Kane Richardson to Rahane, no run length ball outside off, manipulated to short midwicket with the wrists
Kane Richardson to Rahane, no run good length and outside off, clipped out to short midwicket again
Kane Richardson to Rahane, no run shorter and outside off, Rahane is up on his tippy toes as he fends it back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Rahane, no run Rahane forays down the track, fetches a length ball from outside off and belts it to the left of mid-off
Kane Richardson to Rahane, 1 run full and outside off, opens the face and guides it to the right of third man

Coulter-Nile to Rahane, FOUR runs Chipped past the outstretched left hand of Coulter-Nile, then beats mid-off to his right. On a length and outside off, Rahane checks his punch and hits it past the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run finally, the yorker makes an appearance. Right in the blockhole on off, squeezed to point
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 run back of a length on a fourth-stump line, angled down to third man
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 2 runs full and straight, clipped away easily through square leg
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run Rohit shuffles across off, drives this full one from outside off to mid-off
Agar to Kohli, 1 run pushed through flat and quick on middle and leg, hit down to long-on
Agar to Rahane, 1 run slider outside off, pushed down the ground
Agar to Kohli, 1 run straight ball on off, tapped down to long-off
Agar to Rahane, no run slower through the air on middle stump, forward and pushed back to Agar
Agar to Rahane, 1 run worked from off stump through square leg
Agar to Kohli, no run fizzes through on middle and leg, Kohli is cramped for room as he chops to point
Cummins to Rahane, 2 runs back of a length on off, Rahane calls for two as he deftly flicks it to long leg
Cummins to Rahane, no run short and zips through outside off, Rahane can't connect with a late cut
Cummins to Hardik, no run really full and just outside off, driven to cover
Cummins to Hardik, no run back of a length on off, guided to backward point
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run length ball on middle, snakes away, snatches the outside edge and streaks away to third man
Agar to Hardik, SIX runs pushed through flat and too full on middle, Pandya smokes it over the wide long-on boundary. Not middled but such is the strength of Pandya
Agar to Hardik, no run skidding on outside off, pushed to cover
Agar to Hardik, 1 run 100.8ks dart, pushed down to long-on
Agar to Kohli, no run fired outside off, chopped to point
Agar to Kohli, 1 run flat dart on the leg stump, bunted down the ground
Agar to Hardik, 1 run full on middle, worked away to midwicket
Cummins to Hardik, no run 142 kph, fullish outside off, guided towards backward point
Cummins to Hardik, no run full outside off, punched to the cover
Cummins to Hardik, no run full outside off, chipped to the extra cover fielder

Cummins to Hardik, no run that's close! Full on leg, Pandya misses a flick and is struck flush on the pad in front of leg. May have been sliding down. Too early through his shot, definitely going down
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run Pandya's bat doesn't seem to be coming down straight, it's coming down from backward point more than slip. That's why this full delivery has been skewed to deep point
Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs no bat angle problems this time, on the pads, flicked away merrily through backward point for four. Easy as ...
Agar to Hardik, SIX runs under the length and boom! Just a tad full and straight, and Pandya gets underneath it, sends it soaring over long-on with ease. A smile from Kohli
Agar to Hardik, 1 run flatter and wider outside off, punched to deep point
Agar to Kohli, 1 run excellent running. Full and straight, on off, tapped towards point and sets off. Pandya has a positive response and they make a tough run look incredibly easy
Agar to Hardik, no run flat on middle and leg, pushed to long-on, where Maxwell dives away to his left spectacularly to save a run. Sensational cricket
Agar to Hardik, 1 run flat outside off, punched to long-off
Agar to Kohli, 1 run that's cut from the stumps. Such control from Kohli. Flat on off, he goes back and scythes a cut to deep point.
Cummins to Kohli, no run full outside off, driven to cover
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run 147 kph, generating impressive pace but the line is wayward. On Kohli's pads, who gleefully flicks down to fine leg

Cummins to Hardik, 1 run on the pads, Pandya whips it away Steven Smith style, but on the bounce to deep square leg. Cummins and Pandya have a chat, I don't think they're talking about dinner, or any other meal
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run on a length outside off, dabbed towards backward point
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run nice stop from Warner at mid-off. Full outside off, driven away past the bowler. Warner runs to his right, very hard to get past him

Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs actually Kohli can. Too full from Cummins, overpitched outside off and Kohli leans on his drive and sends it between cover and mid-off. When Warner has no chance, not many do
Stoinis to Hardik, 1 run a short offcutter sits up for Pandya to pull to deep midwicket
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run slightly full outside off, a thick outside edge to third man for one. So many times we've seen that
Stoinis to Hardik, 1 run full on the pads, driven with a straight bat to long-on
Stoinis to Kohli, no run 128 kph, overpitched outside off, Kohli creams his cover drive to cover
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run a very short offcutter on middle and off, Kohli watchfully glides his jabbed pull to fine leg
Stoinis to Hardik, no run 128 kph, good length outside off, worked back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full and straight, Kohli shuffles across and walks down but can't time his flick. Finds mid-on. He won't play the dab to third man unless it's too wide
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run 138 kph, full outside off, driven sweetly to extra cover for a run. The fielder stopped that well considering the bobble right in front of him
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, no run on a length around middle and leg, worked to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, 1 run width! Short and wide, cut straight to backward point who can't collect cleanly. Kohli steals the run
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run good length outside off, dabbed to midwicket. No run there
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run slower delivery outside off, guided to third man for one
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run on the pads again, don't know why they keep bowling there. Driven to mid-on for another easy single.

Stoinis to Hardik, 1 run nicely played. A short offcutter, Stoinis cleverly bowls that length for the catch to deep square leg. Pandya brings his bat down from up, which means the ball will always go down. One to square leg
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run 128 kph, tidy bowling from Stoinis, outside off, dabbed down to third man
Stoinis to Hardik, 1 run shortish and straight, punched to long-on
Stoinis to Kohli, no run whipped away to midwicket from the crease. That's just wrist power, a strong bottom hand
Stoinis to Kohli, no run there's that length again. The short, slow offcutter outside off, Kohli under-edged his stabbed pull to the keeper. Good over from Stoinis

Coulter-Nile to Hardik, no run 138 kph, excellent line, goes wide of the crease and bowls this full on off, seaming in. There are four inside the circle on the off side. Driven with a straight bat to mid-off. Bowling to a plan
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, no run full and straight, Pandya's bat angle again comes down at an unnatural angle, driven back
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, no run full and wide outside off this time, chopped to point
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, 1 run Smith saves three. Full and wide outside off, drilled to the right of Smith at cover who gets a hand on it
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full outside off, seaming back in. Kohli stays back and skews a drive to midwicket. Another good over from NCN
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run wide enough for Kohli to open the bat face and guide this down to third man
Stoinis to Kohli, 2 runs driven languidly through cover for an easy couple. Full outside off from Stoinis, far too easy for Kohli
Stoinis to Kohli, no run 131 kph, on a length around off, clipped to midwicket. Kohli not happy with that result
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run another short, slow cutter on off, pulled to deep square leg, on the bounce
Stoinis to Hardik, 1 run outside off, dabbed towards short third man. Richardson dives to his right to save three
Stoinis to Kohli, no run on a length around off, pushed to mid-on
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run fullish outside off, nudged down to third man for another run. Where's the sweat?
Kane Richardson to Kohli, no run nice legcutter from Richardson at 128 kph, Kohli forced into caution, defended
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run guided down to third man again. Just opening the bat face late
Kane Richardson to Hardik, 1 run good length outside off, 139 kph, stabbed into the gap at extra cover for a run
Kane Richardson to Kohli, 1 run full and wide outside off, punched to the sweeper cover
Kane Richardson to Hardik, no run a short delivery around off, Pandya misses an upper ramp
Kane Richardson to Hardik, 1 run chopped down to third man. Pandya wanted two, but Kohli sent him back
Agar to Hardik, 1 run Agar bowls the first one short, not full like previous overs, respectfully driven to long-on
Agar to Kohli, no run on the pads, flicked away to midwicket from the crease
Agar to Jadhav, no run flight on off, defended back
Agar to Jadhav, 2 runs a wild slog from Jadhav, came racing down at Agar but swings from outside the line, gets a thick inside edge to fine leg for two
Agar to Jadhav, no run flat and wide, sliced to point

Kane Richardson to Hardik, 1 run short and wide from Richardson, cut away to backward point. The fielder fumbled and Pandya wanted two, but Jadhav said no. I can think of a few batsmen who would have not been happy with that from Jadhav
Kane Richardson to Pandey, no run 136 kph, full outside off, defended to backward point
Kane Richardson to Pandey, no run on a length on off, 135 kph, bunted back to the bowler
Kane Richardson to Pandey, no run 137 kph, no run to Warner there. Full outside off, driven to Warner at mid-off, who is game aware, and quick on the ball
Kane Richardson to Pandey, no run full outside off, driven away to Warner again. No run. Just the one off the over and a wicket
Agar to Hardik, no run slow and straight, defended back to the bowler
Agar to Hardik, SIX runs picks the length, stays back and wallops a flat-batted six over midwicket. Does in Agar in the mind, Agar forced into a short length, and Pandya was waiting on the back foot
Agar to Hardik, no run winds up but Agar bowls this wide outside off, slapped to cover
Agar to Hardik, FOUR runs in the gap again. Short on middle and leg, 99 kph, too quick. Pandya gleefully pulls over midwicket. Stands there and admires the shot. The arrogance.
Agar to Hardik, no run 90 kph, slower on off, driven to cover. Well bowled

Agar to Hardik, 1 run dropped! A very tough catch for Smith, but they needed that. Flight outside off, Pandya wants to go straight but agar extracts some turn, the ball skews off the outside half and lobs towards a cover at the edge of the circle. Smith backtracks, gets underneath it and spills a hard chance.
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, 1 run worked away to deep midwicket this time.
Coulter-Nile to Pandey, FOUR runs tripe from Coulter-Nile, short down leg and Pandey gets off the mark with a whip through fine leg.
Coulter-Nile to Pandey, FOUR runs terrific power. 138 kph, full around off, Pandey smashes his drive back past the bowler. Mid-off and mid-on both are in. Not quite timed
Coulter-Nile to Pandey, no run full on leg, clipped to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Pandey, 1 run eeks, that's a bad shot. Full and wide outside off, skewed to wide mid-on. Wanted to go over cover
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, no run good improvisation from Pandya. Wants to pull but the ball is not there to do so, so he defends it back. Something Jadhav did not do
Agar to Pandey, no run full on leg, blocked to mid-on. Good captaincy from Smith to keep mid-on up
Agar to Pandey, 1 run short and wide outside off, punched to deep point
Agar to Hardik, SIX runs six more! He's not bothered about the previous failure. Runs to the pitch and smashes it over long-on. Quick footwork. Proper power
Agar to Hardik, 1 run gets to fifty. India's new allrounder gets an ovation. 100 kph outside off, worked to deep midwicket
Agar to Pandey, no run 91 kph, flat on leg, pushed to mid-on.
Agar to Pandey, no run quick and straight, blocked back. Good batting from Pandey
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, no run 132 kph, a good length delivery, moving back in, defended from the crease
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, 1 run driven to long-on, 141 kph. Had to wait for the ball to beat a diving midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Pandey, 1 run good length delivery outside off, slapped to midwicket, who dives to his left and parries to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, 2 runs on the pads and whipped away through backward square leg for another couple. Good result
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, no run 129 kph, good length outside off, punched to cover from the crease
Coulter-Nile to Hardik, 1 leg bye short on off, Pandya misses a pull, the ball creeps underneath and hits him in the midriff. Ouch. A leg bye, more a groin bye
Agar to Hardik, no run flight outside off, driven to cover. Not the line he wants so he plays it out
Agar to Hardik, 1 run overpitched outside off, driven to long-off
Agar to Pandey, 1 run short and wide, under-edged to short third man for one
Agar to Hardik, 1 run full and wide, a no-feet drive to cover.
Agar to Pandey, no run slow on off, blocked to cover
Agar to Pandey, no run quick outside off, Pandey goes back and defends. Agar's done for the night, bowled better than 1 for 71
Cummins to Hardik, no run good length outside off, dabbed towards cover, 136 kph. Well improvised again
Cummins to Hardik, no run 141 kph, fullish length outside off, driven to cover

Cummins to Hardik, FOUR runs just wide of the stumps and that's four. Full and wide outside off, a thick inside edge somehow evades the stumps and races away down to fine leg. Terrific bowling, just enough lateral movement
Cummins to Hardik, no run nicely hit, good stop too. Full and straight, driven back to Cummins, who gets a boot on it in his follow through
Cummins to Hardik, 2 runs dabbed wide of backward point. Finch had to run around that at third man
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run good length outside off, a tap to third man
Stoinis to Hardik, 1 run fullish and straight, pushed to long-on with ease
Stoinis to Pandey, no run 128 kph, around off, driven to mid-on
Stoinis to Pandey, 2 runs a short cutter again, a thick leading edge lobs towards fine leg. Good stop from the fielder at fine leg. A couple more. A forehand slap
Stoinis to Pandey, no run nudged to midwicket
Stoinis to Pandey, FOUR runs gets the gap and on this outfield, it's four all night long. Full and wide, slapped through cover for four. Used the pace and deflected the ball where he wanted
Stoinis to Pandey, no run short again, pulled to mid-on. Stoinis has a word with the batsman, who has nothing to say in return
Cummins to Hardik, FOUR runs full and straight, beautifully, delectably, elegantly on-driven through long-on. The timing is impeccable
Cummins to Hardik, no run good length on middle and leg, drags his length back, defended
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run deftly dabbed to third man for a run
Cummins to Pandey, 1 run good length outside off, carved away to the sweeper cover for one. Pandey doing his thing
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run a slower delivery on leg, 123 kph, worked down to fine leg
Cummins to Pandey, 1 run full and wide, sliced to third man.
Stoinis to Pandey, FOUR runs over mid-on. Full around off, Pandey wanted to go straight over the bowler's head but the ball skews off the inside half, the bat handle turns in his hands but who cares?
Stoinis to Pandey, FOUR runs that should be the game now. A short cutter again, far too predictable, sits up for Pandey to whack through midwicket. Too easy.

Stoinis to Pandey, 1 run another short cutter on off and middle, think Mike and Bob Bryan's touch volley and think Pandey's touch forehand push to long-on. They aren't too much different. One to mid-on

Stoinis to Hardik, FOUR runs what a shot. A short slow delivery on off, Pandey doesn't change the way the bat is moving, he just adjusts the bat to ensure the ball hits the bat, so that the ball doesn't go to third man. Instead, it goes right over the keeper. That is the perfect ramp shot
Stoinis to Hardik, FOUR runs a tad short on middle and leg and Pandya muscles the pull through midwicket. Fantastic stroke-making
Stoinis to Hardik, 1 run dabbed towards third man for a run
Cummins to Hardik, no run good length around off and middle, defended back
Cummins to Hardik, no run wild. Full outside off, Pandya has done anything he wants this innings, so he tries a no-look swing, but fails to connect.
Cummins to Hardik, no run good length on leg, follows Pandya, defended
Cummins to Hardik, no run good stop from Handscomb. Short down leg, gloved down to fine leg, where Handscomb dives to his lefgt and saves four. Applause from the bowler.
Cummins to Hardik, 1 wide strays down leg for a wide. 140 kph
Cummins to Dhoni, 1 run on the pads, flicked through square leg for a run
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run full around off, driven to long-on. The crowd goes silent
Maxwell to Pandey, no run 83 kph, full and wide outside off, driven to mid-off
Maxwell to Pandey, 1 run flat and straight, nudged down to fine leg
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run on the pads, worked to square leg.
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run whipped away to square leg again, nice and calm, soaking in the chants
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run driven away with the spin to midwicket. Two off the over, but not good enough for Australia
Kane Richardson to Pandey, FOUR runs that's a boundary. Full and wide from Richardson, Pandey clears his front leg and nails his lofted drive over the bowler. Stunning timing and power
Kane Richardson to Pandey, no run short of a length outside off, pulled to midwicket
Kane Richardson to Pandey, 1 run a low full toss, whipped away to deep square leg. The crowd is happy with just one.
Kane Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run short on off, pulled down to fine leg. Dhoni does what Dhoni does. Onto you

Kane Richardson to Pandey, 1 run a french cut to finish. A yorker on leg, skewed between his legs for a run to square leg. And India now become the No. 1 ODI team in the world and finish off this series as quickly as possible.
Presentation time.

9.18pm Not many ODI chases have been as clinical and as convincing as that this year. Chasing 294, India got a fine start via fifties from Ajinkya Rahane and Rohit Sharma, and that was it really. Australia just did not have the depth or personnel to challenge India's strong batting thereon. India did stutter, but they now have nine wins on the bounce, consistency that has earned them the tag of the best team in the world in this format. Australia were well short, 350 may have been a par score but as soon as they
India won by 5 wickets (with 13 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Hardik Pandya, INDIA
